statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_time < '2022-01-01' AND query_executed LIKE '%DROP TABLE%';
DELETE FROM suspicious_queries WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audited_log WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM suspicious_queries WHERE user_id = 75 AND timestamp < '2021-09-15';
DELETE FROM table3 WHERE user_id = 100 AND change_type = 'update';
DELETE FROM table2 WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'login';
